Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Renderables.CardRelated

Class CardRenderable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Renderables.Renderable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Renderables.LightGameRenderable
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Renderables.CardRelated.CardRenderable
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandObserver, InputObserver, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseStartCardRenderable, HandOthersRenderable
public class CardRenderable extends LightGameRenderable
This class is a Renderable that can render a card.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardRenderable

      public CardRenderable(String name, CardMuseum museum, LightGame game, CardFace face, CommandPrompt[] relatedCommands, ControllerProvider view)
      Creates a new CardRenderable.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the renderable.
      museum - The card museum to use.
      game - The lightGame to render.
      face - The face of the card to render.
      relatedCommands - The commands related to this renderable.
      view - The controller provider.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render()
      Renders the card. In this case it does nothing.
      Specified by:
      render in class Renderable

    • updateInput

      public void updateInput(String input)

      Specified by:

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
